welcome_message_body: Welcome to Framingham, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, diverse dining scene, and friendly community during your visit. Enjoy your time in Framingham!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves primarily international flights for major airlines

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic flights for major airlines

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Dedicated for international flights for various airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal with domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
